price: ጓዞቻችሁንም በነፍሶች ችግር እንጂ ወደማትደርሱበት አገር ትሸከማለች፡፡ ጌታችሁ በእርግጥ ሩኅሩኅ አዛኝ ነውና፡፡
arabic: وَتَحۡمِلُ أَثۡقَالَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٖ لَّمۡ تَكُونُواْ بَٰلِغِيهِ إِلَّا بِشِقِّ ٱلۡأَنفُسِۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wataḥmilu athqālakum ilā baladin lam takūnū bālighīhi illā bishiqqi al-anfusi inna rabbakum laraūfun raḥīmun
